Package andesite.send

Interface AudioHandler

public interface AudioHandler

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void closeConnection​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String guildId)
    Closes a connection for the given user and guild.
    void handleVoiceUpdate​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String guildId, java.lang.String sessionId, java.lang.String endpoint, java.lang.String token)
    Handles a voice update.
    void setProvider​(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String guildId, AudioProvider provider)
    Sets the provider for the given user and guild.

  • Method Details

    • setProvider

      void setProvider​(@Nonnull java.lang.String userId, @Nonnull java.lang.String guildId, @Nullable AudioProvider provider)
      Sets the provider for the given user and guild. A null provider will remove the existing provider, if it exists.
      If there is already a provider set, it's close method will be called.
      Parameters:
      userId - User id for the provider.
      guildId - Guild id for the provider.
      provider - Provider to set.

    • handleVoiceUpdate

      void handleVoiceUpdate​(@Nonnull java.lang.String userId, @Nonnull java.lang.String guildId, @Nonnull java.lang.String sessionId, @Nonnull java.lang.String endpoint, @Nonnull java.lang.String token)
      Handles a voice update.
      Parameters:
      userId - User id for the update.
      guildId - Guild id for the update.
      sessionId - Session id of the voice state.
      endpoint - Endpoint of the voice server.
      token - Token of the voice connection.

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection​(@Nonnull java.lang.String userId, @Nonnull java.lang.String guildId)
      Closes a connection for the given user and guild. If the connection has a provider set, it's close method will be called.
      Parameters:
      userId - User id of the connection.
      guildId - Guild id of the connection.
